title: Critical Error
body: Critical Error when i try to load into game, Never had this problem before, help, and im probably going to get a ban

replies.body:
Hey PiradeX,

You didn't give us much information, so I'm going to need you to give us a bit more info before we're able to help. So here's a few things I'm going to need:

+ Could you post a screenshot of the error message?


+ Did this just start happening after a recent patch? Or has it been an issue for a long time?


+ Can you post your computer's specs? 
 You can access you computers specs by right clicking on the windows icon in the bottom right corner, and selecting _"System"_ from the menu of options, then screenshot or copy and paste the _"Device specifications"_ section. See [this](https://www.sweetwater.com/sweetcare/media/2017/04/Windows-PC-Computer-System-Specifications.gif) gif for help.


+ Have you already tried a full repair or reinstalling the game?

Make sure you reply to this comment wit the answers or else I won't get notified!
